article.Heading: Budget 2017: Commodity bourses' woes & hopes
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18â€™s Manisha Gupta, Samir Shah, MD & CEO at NCDEX spoke about the wishlist prepared by the commodity bourses for the upcoming Budget.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Manisha Gupta, Samir Shah, MD & CEO at NCDEX spoke about the wishlist prepared by the commodity bourses for the upcoming Budget.
